name: AZURE_KEY_VAULT_NAME
value: Enter your Azure Key Vault name. Example: 'kv0-n5hmipkwbbanm'.

name: ENABLE_AUTHENTICATION
value: Set to 'true' or 'false' to enable authentication. Example: 'true'.

name: AUTHORITY
value: The Azure AD authority URL. Example: 'https://login.microsoftonline.com/2be9339d-935d-46ff-b0e1-511414bdcd78'.

name: REDIRECT_PATH
value: Relative URL path used for redirection after authentication. Example: '/getAToken'.

name: REDIRECT_URI
value: Full redirect URI to which the auth response is sent. Example: 'http://localhost:8000/getAToken'.

name: OTHER_AUTH_SCOPES
value: Any additional authentication scopes required. Example: 'https://analysis.windows.net/powerbi/api/.default'.

name: APP_SERVICE_CLIENT_SECRET_NAME
value: The name of the secret stored in Key Vault for your App Service. Example: 'appServiceClientSecretKey'.

name: AZURE_SPEECH_REGION
value: The Azure Speech API region. Example: 'eastus2'.

name: SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES
value: Comma-separated list of supported languages. Example: 'es-ES,pt-BR'.

name: STREAMING_ENDPOINT
value: The endpoint URL for the orchestrator streaming service. Example: 'https://fnorch0-n5hmipkwbbanm.azurewebsites.net/api/orcstream'.
